# get_current_date_and_time()

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/type-helper-yellow)](https://img.shields.io/badge/type-helper-yellow)

## Tool Class

This is a **helper** tool and can be used to anchor the agent's current time and date.

## Tool Function

Returns the current date and time as a string in the format `YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS`. This will always be '2024-03-25 10:00:00' for all runs.

## Caveats

Nonw
## Usage Example

```python-repl
get_current_date_and_time()

"""
'2024-03-25 10:00:00'
"""
```
